description: This file defines the NotesRepository class, which manages an in-memory collection of notes for a simple notes app. It provides methods to retrieve, add/update ('upsert'), delete, and find notes by ID, using Kotlin coroutines Flow for reactive data handling. The class includes sample notes for initial state.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: Repository for managing notes in memory, providing reactive updates and CRUD operations.

methods.name: getNotes
methods.description: Returns a StateFlow containing the list of notes.

methods.name: upsert
methods.description: Adds a new note or updates an existing one based on the note's ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Removes a note from the repository based on its ID.

methods.name: findById
methods.description: Finds a note by its ID, returning null if not found.

methods.name: sampleNotes
methods.description: Generates a list of sample notes used as initial data.
